channel.title: Azure Blob on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Blob on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Cloud-to-Cloud migration made simple with Azure Storage Mover
item.description:
Azure Storage Mover’s AWS S3 to Azure Blob migration capability is now generally available, enabling organizations to move data directly from AWS to Azure securely, reliably, and at scale while removing the need for manual pipelines.

  • Source: Azure Updates
